Aaron ... exactly which build were you using? 
I'm asking because Phil fixed some stuff in this area, and not sure if 
he fixed what you are seeing, or if you are seeing a side-effect of his fix.

Eclipse: Version: 3.1.0 Build id: I20050627-1435
JEM-SDK-I20050623.zip
GEF-SDK-3.1RC4.zip
wtp-1.0M5.zip

(In reply to comment #1)
> Aaron ... exactly which build were you using? 
> I'm asking because Phil fixed some stuff in this area, and not sure if 
> he fixed what you are seeing, or if you are seeing a side-effect of his fix. 
>

So ... Phil, appears this was found on a build which preceeded your recent fixes. 
Can you confirm? If you believe this this problem can no longer occur with your
changes, feel free to mark as 'fixed' and perhaps Aaron can verify on a recent
I-build, or on RC1 (due 7/13).
Mass transfer from pa to dw. Needs more triage.

AbstractNotifier keeps the list of adapters within an array, increasing it when it is not big enough to handle all of the adapters being added.  It does not shrink the array when adapters are removed, however, which leaves nulls within it that getExistingAdapter() can run into if an adapter type is requested that is not present.
